2024.title: NVIDIA Isaac Manipulator
2024.description: AI-based toolkit for robotic manipulation, integrating perception, planning, and control with NVIDIA Omniverse and DeepStream.

2024.title: Open Robotics Ignition Gazebo
2024.description: Next-generation successor to Gazebo Classic, offering modular architecture, real-time simulation, and cloud support.

2024.title: Universal Robots URSim
2024.description: Simulator for UR collaborative robots allowing users to test URScript programs and cell layouts virtually.

2024.title: Boston Dynamics Spot SDK
2024.description: Software development kit enabling developers to control and integrate Spot robot with custom payloads and autonomous missions.

2024.title: NVIDIA Omniverse Replicator
2024.description: Synthetic data generation engine used for training perception models in robotics and automation pipelines.

2024.title: Luxonis DepthAI
2024.description: Edge AI vision platform combining depth sensing and object detection for robotics and automation applications.
